lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In one bizarre dispute in January, Sarney surprised Brazilian business leaders by declaring that they were allies of the 19th century anarchist Mikhail Bakunin.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: When the government announced a month ago that it was suspending interest payments on Brazil's 68 billion dlr debt to commercial banks, it said this was a means of ensuring growth and avoiding recession.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Businessmen are deeply concerned about the effect on industry of import restrictions introduced earlier this year because of the country's deteriorating trade balance.
